chemoreception.notes: Sea slugs use chemoreception to locate food and mates. This is inferred to be present in Actinocyclidae as they are dorid nudibranchs.

photoreception.notes: The presence and functionality of photoreceptors in Actinocyclidae are unknown.

mechanoreception.notes: Sea slugs possess mechanoreceptors for sensing their environment. This is inferred to be present in Actinocyclidae as they are dorid nudibranchs.
